catalog_script_client.name: 04_Change User

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_b6273c611bdb5414f47667853a4bcb7f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="17e65706dbc8730095c0d730cf9619a2" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Gestão de Usuário">186971c51b5e1810776c0e9fe54bcbdd</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:b1960e051b525810776c0e9fe54bcbc3</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>04_Change User</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
	   g_form.clearValue('user_name');
	   g_form.setReadOnly('user_name',true);
	   g_form.clearValue('u_user_roles');
	   g_form.setReadOnly('u_user_roles',true);
		
      return;
   }

	var ga = new GlideAjax("x_tivit_user_manag.AjaxUtils");
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','getUser');
	ga.addParam('user', newValue);
	ga.getXML(ajaxResponse);
   
	g_form.setReadOnly('user_name',true);
}

function ajaxResponse(serverResponse){
	
	var parm = serverResponse.responseXML.getElementsByTagName("Parm");
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_user_roles',false);
	
	for(var i = 0; i < parm.length; i ++) { 
		var name = parm[i].getAttribute("name");
		var value = parm[i].getAttribute("value");
		
		g_form.clearValue(name);
		
		if(value !=  'null'){
			g_form.setValue(name,value);
			g_form.setDisplay(name,true);
		}
		
	}
		
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>leandro.monteiro@tivit.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-16 16:25:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>17e65706dbc8730095c0d730cf9619a2</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b6273c611bdb5414f47667853a4bcb7f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>04_Change User</sys_name><sys_overrides display_value="">655e46051bd25810776c0e9fe54bcbf6</sys_overrides><sys_package display_value="User Management" source="x_tivit_user_manag">704931851b5e1810776c0e9fe54bcbde</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="User Management">704931851b5e1810776c0e9fe54bcbde</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b6273c611bdb5414f47667853a4bcb7f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>leandro.monteiro@tivit.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-16 16:25:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
